== Main Inclusion Report for keyutils ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/k/keyutils; available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Build dependency of krb5
 0. ''Security:''
** No <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=keyutils|CVE entries]]</nowiki>.
** No <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=keyutils|Secunia history]]</nowiki>.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid. No daemons.
** Does not open any port.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** Does not ask any debconf questions.
** <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:keyutils|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>: only one minor bug.
** <nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.debian.org/k/keyutils.html|Maintenance in Debian]]</nowiki> is good.
** <nowiki>[[http://people.redhat.com/~dhowells/keyutils/|Upstream]]</nowiki> is alive.
** <nowiki>[[https://bugzilla.redhat.com/bugzilla/buglist.cgi?component=keyutils|Upstream bug tracker]]</nowiki>: no open bugs.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>.
** Meets <nowiki>[[http://www.netfort.gr.jp/~dancer/column/libpkg-guide/libpkg-guide.html|Debian library packaging guide]]</nowiki> standards.
** Standard debhelper packaging system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** debhelper, which is in main.
